Thank you for visiting our website, in order to make web development faster and more efficient, please answer the questions in our "website design requirements" document, it helps us to get a better understanding of your ideas and to create a meaningful proposal & quotation that will match with your requirements. It's download address is - website design requirements. Then please send it back to us with your answers and comments.

Following are our website design price range for your reference:

Responsive website design

About RMB30000+ ($5000+)

  1. Compatible with IE9.0 or above browsers (IE9, 10, 11, Firefox, chrome, Safari ）;
  2. Responsive design surpport PC, iphone, iPad (one site with one backend);
  3. Professional graphical and layout design;
  4. Products manage system(CMS) with Access database;
  5. Contact form / Order form;
  6. Guestbook;
  7. News(CMS);
  8. Natural SEO (Search Engine Optimization);
  9. One year free technical support.

Standard business website

About RMB15000+ ($2500+)

  1. HTML page design (Homepage, About us, Contact us, etc);
  2. Professional graphical and layout design;
  3. Products manage system(CMS) with Access database;
  4. Contact form / Order form;
  5. Guestbook;
  6. News(CMS);
  7. Natural SEO (Search Engine Optimization);
  8. One year free technical support.

E-commerce website

About Responsive Design ：RMB60000+ ($10000+);
Normal PC Design：RMB35000+ ($6000+)

  1. HTML page design (Homepage, About us, Contact us, etc);
  2. Professional graphical and layout design;
  3. Products manage system(CMS) with mysql/mssql database;
  4. Affilate function;
  5. Shopping Cart;
  6. Online Payament model. Paypal / Authorizie.net (AIM, SIM);
  7. Contact form / Order form;
  8. Guestbook;
  9. News(CMS);
  10. BBS/Forum;
  11. Natural SEO (Search Engine Optimization);
  12. One year free technical support.

Full flash website

About RMB20000+ ($3500+)

  1. Graphic design;
  2. Scence background design;
  3. Action script coding with php or asp, xml;
  4. Database design;
  5. Pictures romance;
  6. Flash story script;
  7. Video / Audio integrate.

Website Platform (Customized big web projects)

Start RMB100000+ ($17000)

  1. B2B / B2C / C2C / O2O / B2B2C platform;
  2. Video website;
  3. Web 2.0 website;
  4. Other customized big websites.
